name: Dead Dungeon (itch) (Robert Doman)
description:
Dead Dungeon is a game about fighting through a dungeon to level up, improve your skills and beat the final boss.

This game was made for the Game Boy Competition 2021 and is intended to be played on a Game Boy Color. The projects files are also downloadable!

Controls

ActionGame BoyKeyboardMove
D-PadArrow Keys
Skip TextAZStart Game
StartEnterInteractAZAttackBXPlace Bomb
SelectShift
